item.title: Winston Peters: 'No value in saving Covid people if greater social damage caused'
item.description:
Deputy Prime Minister Winston Peters says there is "no value" in trying to save people who have coronavirus if it means greater social damage is caused.
We need to save our economy as fast as we can ...

item.title: One person dies, child injured after electrocution incident involving powerlines
item.description:

item.description:
